node.name: Toad Extension for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
From the makers of Toad for Oracle! We're adding the power of Toad into the Eclipse framework to help you manage changes to your database - without leaving Eclipse! Moreover, Toad Extension for Eclipse supports not only the Oracle database, but also PostgreSQL and MySQL now! And it's all available for free.

Toad Extension for Eclipse allows you to:

  • Connect to your Oracle, PostgreSQL or MySQL database from within Eclipse
  • Browse data, object relationships and other detailed object properties
  • Develop complex PL/SQL code comfortably
  • Query data with easy export functions
  • Manage or Edit data and objects quickly
  • Import/Export of BLOBs
  • Export data

    • ... and take advantage of many standard Eclipse features including Local History, integration with version control systems, XML editor and more!
node.body:

Moreover, Toad Extension for Eclipse supports not only the Oracle database, but also PostgreSQL and MySQL now! And it's all available for free.
